公司名稱，統編(中華民國以外註冊可免填):Robert Walters, 53546368
公司地址(填寫詳細至號): 台北市信義區松智路1號10樓

Position: QA- Software Test Engineer (Automation)
Location: Neihu


Key responsibilities include:
-Specify, develop and maintain test automation tools and frameworks.
-Continuous improvement of software test process using latest methodologies.
-Plan, develop and deliver effective test plans to agreed timescales and solve common problems differently using a variety of methods.
-Research and prototype new technologies and methods to improve the test process.

Key requirements include:
-At least 3 years experience working in building and running test systems.
-Strong experience in test automation tools (ex. Selenium, Protractor, Sauce Labs, JMeter, etc) and Continuous integration solutions (ex. Gitlab, Jenkins or TeamCity, etc.)
-strong experience in building automated testing capabilities for CI/CD pipelines and are knowledgeable around testing distributed systems.
-Knowledge and experience around Test Driven Development is a strong advantage.


Salary: 0.9-1.3M, depending on related experience
